text: Sailas nan akuragha, ia bagha akɨnafarir otevir kam osiri. Ezɨ kɨ an garima, a Krais baghavɨra itir aveghbuar aghuim. Ezɨ akɨnafarir kam, kɨ God a uan apangkuvim ian akazir arazim ia mɨkɨmasa. Kɨ uabɨ kɨ fo, kar guizbangɨra Godɨn apangkuvim, ezɨ kɨ deravɨra an gun ia mɨgei. Egha kɨ akar gavgavim ia ganɨdi, ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn apangkuvimɨn ikɨva tugh gavgafigh.
